select-by-config.caption: AT25DFx SerialFlash
select-by-config.name: config.at25dfx.hal
select-by-config.info:
AT25DFx SerialFlash driver, supplying basic functions for reading, writing, (globally) protecting and unprotecting sectors, putting to sleep and waking the SerialFlash device.
Functionality for permanently locking and securing the device is not supplied by this driver.
Support for different SPI drivers or variants of them may be available, depending on the device.

select-by-device.caption: AT25DFx SerialFlash with polled SPI
select-by-device.info:
Polled SPI variant of the AT25DFx SerialFlash driver.
This variant can give a speed benefit over interrupt based variant at high baud rates, in single-threaded applications.
